item.title: 7 Essential Tips for the Enlightened Tech Writer
item.dc:creator: Ted Hudek

item.title: Transforming your Documentation Process
item.description:
Description

Jon Bulava, Ted Hudek, Zach Corleissen, Leon Barnard, Riona MacNamara http://lanyrd.com/2016/writethedocs/sfbztg/ We had a number of interesting presentations about companies transforming their documentation process. Instead of choosing just one, we asked the speakers to join us on a panel, so that folks can compare and contrast the different approaches.
item.dc:creator: Jon Bulava
